about_the_game:
This is Fluff's Adventure!


Discover an idyllic world through the eyes of colorful furbballs called Fluffs in this third-person puzzle platformer.
Explore an island full of secrets and collectibles for you to find. Learn to overcome challenges - both through dexterity while platforming in Fluff's oversized shoes and by solving numerous puzzles that will prevent you from progressing. But be warned: an evil force is invading Fluff's world and threatens to destroy the idyll forever ...

What awaits you?
Explore large-scale levels: Fluff's Adventure takes place in levels that you can explore at will. The aim is to reach the end of a level, but of course there are numerous secrets that you can find along the way.




Solve color-based puzzles: Fluff's colors aren't just for show: After finding other Fluffs, you can freely switch between them to solve puzzles. Many puzzle elements in the game are colored, so you can only interact with them with a Fluff of the same color or with other objects of the same color.




Immerse yourself in a relaxed and undirected game atmosphere: Fluff's Adventure won't annoy you with explanatory text or long drawn-out tutorials: you can explore the world at your own pace and solve puzzles without being pulled out of the game environment by texts or hints. Puzzles will also never put you under time pressure: Pure relaxation (as long as you don't get frustrated by solving puzzles)!




Experience the adventures of Fluff in a gripping story Fluff's island is haunted by metallic creatures. Find out the reason for their arrival and stop them before it's too late ...

What is the current state of development?
Fluff's Adventure is expected to contain six levels, each with its own environment and puzzles. The first level is playable as a demo. After the second level, a first release in Early Access is planned before the remaining levels are released. Levels two to six will contain puzzles thematically based on the following elements:
  • Light: A dark temple introduces Fluff to the history of his own island and an unknown friend assists in handling lasers and light elements.
  • Air: Fluff experiences the invasion first hand. Escape to lofty heights and forge a plan to save the island.
  • Water: Every puzzle game needs an underwater level! Fight against currents, shift water levels to your advantage and color fluffs to solve tricky puzzles.
  • Fire In the volcanic center of the island, learn more about the goals of the metallic invaders and harness the dangerous element without scorching your own pelt!
  • Space In the epic finale, Fluff learns to control gravity himself and must find his way in a completely unfamiliar environment. Will all his experience and skill be enough to stop the evil?
Join my Discord server to make sure you don't miss any of the latest developments!

short_description: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel is a 3D third-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The game is focusing on non-textual storytelling, exploration and puzzles centered around fluffy furballs called "Fluffs". It creates a wholesome atmosphere in a stylized and colorful environment.
